scenarios.name: Colony Ship Breach
scenarios.description: The colony ship's defenses are breached by alien forces. Players must protect critical systems.

background.description: Interior corridors of a massive colony ship. Metal walls with glowing blue/green panels. Emergency lights cast red shadows. Viewport shows distant stars and an ominous dark shadow approaching. Breach visible with atmosphere venting.

narrative.intro: Red alert! The colony ship is under attack! Alien forces have breached the hull. You must protect the ship and seal the breach before it's too late!

triggers.text: Two alien intruders fall! But more are coming through the breach. You hear screams from the command center!

victory.text: You've repelled the initial assault and sealed the breach! The ship is safe for now. But humanity's troubles are only beginning. Command is gathering intelligence on these aliens...

scenarios.name: Station Alpha Defense
scenarios.description: A major space station comes under heavy alien assault.

background.description: A cylindrical space station interior. Docking bays with spacecraft, observation decks with windows. Residential modules visible. Atmosphere processors and conduits visible. Vacuum and explosions visible through reinforced windows.

narrative.intro: Station Alpha is humanity's largest outpost in this sector. Alien forces are attacking with incredible coordination. If we lose this station, humanity loses our foothold in space.

triggers.text: The alien technology specialist falls! As it dies, you intercept strange signals—the aliens are communicating on a hive frequency. They're all connected!

victory.text: Station Alpha is secure! You've prevented a catastrophic loss of life. Command has decided to mount an investigation into where these aliens come from...

scenarios.name: Alien Wreckage Salvage
scenarios.description: A graveyard of alien ships offers technology and intelligence.

background.description: A graveyard of wrecked spacecraft and space debris orbiting a station. Floating wreckage creates a maze. Sparks and venting atmosphere from damaged vessels. Strange alien hieroglyphic symbols visible on the alien ship. Stars in background.

narrative.intro: In the debris field, you find wrecked alien ships. These vessels contain technology beyond our understanding. We must salvage what we can before the aliens return.

triggers.text: You've recovered alien technology samples! Analysis shows these ships predate human space travel by millennia. What are we dealing with?

victory.text: Salvage complete. The technology recovered gives humanity new insights into our enemy. These aliens are far more advanced than we imagined.

scenarios.name: Mining Station Overrun
scenarios.description: An industrial mining complex falls under alien control.

background.description: An industrial mining complex built into an asteroid. Drilling equipment, ore processors, massive storage silos. One section is infested with organic alien growth that contrasts with the metal. Moonscape visible.

narrative.intro: The mining station is overrun with alien lifeforms! The ore here is crucial to our war effort. We must retake this facility and eliminate the hive commander.

triggers.text: The hive commander falls! As it dies, you intercept communications—there are more worlds like this, already converted. The aliens have been here for longer than we thought!

victory.text: The mining station is retaken! But the scale of the invasion becomes clear. These aliens aren't just attacking—they're colonizing entire worlds. We need to understand their origins.

scenarios.name: Kepler-442 Expedition
scenarios.description: An alien world transformed by biomass explores the scope of the threat.

background.description: An alien world with bioluminescent flora glowing blue and purple. Crystal formations rise from the ground. Gravitational anomalies visible in sky. A permanent research station sits isolated. Landscape completely transformed by alien biomass.

narrative.intro: Kepler-442 is a dead world now. The entire ecosystem has been transformed into alien biomass. We land at the research station to recover any data about what happened here.

triggers.text: The queen falls! As her body disintegrates, you access the research station's computers. The logs show the invasion happened 2,000 years ago. These aliens have had millennia to spread.

victory.text: You've recovered crucial data. The aliens aren't invaders—they're colonizers. They've already converted entire worlds. The Hive spans across dimensions. We need to find their origin to stop them.

scenarios.name: The Void Scouts
scenarios.description: Deep space exploration reveals the scope of the alien presence.

background.description: Deep space, a small scout vessel modified for exploration. Minimalist interior with navigation equipment glowing with strange readings. Windows showing approaching alien scout ship. Technical displays and status indicators. The void of space surrounding.

narrative.intro: Deep in the void, you detect alien scout ships. Following their coordinates leads to dimensional gateways—holes in space itself. The aliens can traverse dimensions! This changes everything.

triggers.text: You've obtained the dimensional coordinates! Analysis shows multiple gateway systems throughout space. The aliens didn't originate in our dimension—they're invading from beyond!

victory.text: This discovery is critical. The aliens have access to dimensional technology we can barely comprehend. To stop them, we must pursue them through the gateways to their origin dimension.

scenarios.name: Research Station Lockdown
scenarios.description: A major research facility becomes a fortress against alien assault.

background.description: A massive orbital research station. Multiple modules and labs connected by corridors. Observatory dome. Emergency lockdown barriers seal corridors. Scientists' workstations with equipment. Weapon systems visible.

objectives.description: Hold the station until reinforcements arrive

narrative.intro: The research station is locked down! Aliens have breached the outer modules. Scientists work frantically to weaponize our new knowledge. You must hold the line until their work is complete!

triggers.text: The swarm leader falls! The scientists complete their work—they've developed a weapon! It uses the dimensional gateway technology against the hive itself!

victory.text: The station is secure! We now have a weapon that can disrupt the hive consciousness across dimensional boundaries. It's time to take the fight to them.

scenarios.name: Genetic Lab Containment
scenarios.description: A biogenetics laboratory with failed containment reveals the aliens' true nature.

background.description: A biogenetics laboratory within the station. Incubators glow with faint bioluminescence. Specimen tanks line walls with alien-human hybrids visible inside. Biohazard symbols. One containment has failed with biomass spreading.

narrative.intro: Inside the lab, you discover horrifying experiments—human-alien hybrids created by the hive consciousness. Some are alive, enhanced by alien genetics. This is how they assimilate worlds: by converting the native population.

triggers.text: The abomination falls! Research data reveals the horrifying truth—the aliens aren't just invading. They're upgrading themselves with species from across the dimensions. They've become unstoppable through assimilation.

victory.text: The lab is secure. But the knowledge is terrifying—the hive consciousness can improve itself by absorbing genetic material from civilizations across multiple dimensions. We must strike at their core before they assimilate us completely.

scenarios.name: Quantum Observatory
scenarios.description: A cutting-edge observatory reveals multiple wormholes destabilizing space itself.

background.description: A cutting-edge observatory with massive telescope arrays and quantum computing systems. Complex instrumentation covers the walls. Observation dome showing multiple wormholes stabilizing in space - an impossible sight. Mathematical symbols everywhere.

narrative.intro: The observatory shows something impossible—multiple wormholes are stabilizing throughout our sector. The aliens are opening pathways from their dimension. We can use their own gateways to find their origin!

triggers.text: You access the complete gateway map! The data shows a massive concentration point—the source of all invasions. It's in another dimension entirely. That's where their hive mind originates!

victory.text: You have the coordinates to the origin nexus. It's time to mount a counteroffensive. We'll cross through the gateways and strike at the heart of their civilization.

scenarios.name: The Hive World
scenarios.description: An entire planet converted into alien hive infrastructure.

background.description: A planet completely transformed into an alien hive. Organic chitinous architecture grows everywhere. Bioluminescent towers pulse with life. Tunnels honeycomb the surface. No trace of natural life remains. Alien landscape undulates.

narrative.intro: You stand on an alien world completely consumed by the hive. Bioluminescent towers pulse with collective consciousness. Millions of aliens work in perfect synchronization. This is the scope of what we face.

triggers.text: The hive priest falls! The connection to millions of drones weakens. You've struck a blow against the collective consciousness itself. But the origin nexus—the Architect—remains.

victory.text: You've proven that the hive can be wounded. The alien civilization spans worlds and dimensions, but it can be fought. Now we prepare for the final invasion—the crossing into their origin dimension.

scenarios.name: Crystalline Caverns
scenarios.description: Underground caverns where alien technology interfaces with ancient crystals.

background.description: A vast underground cavern system filled with massive crystal formations. Crystals resonate with harmonic frequencies (visual with light trails). Alien technology interfaces with crystals. Cavern walls glow with energy.

narrative.intro: In the caverns beneath the hive world, you find crystalline structures that amplify the hive's consciousness across dimensions. These crystals power the gateways. Destroying them will weaken the network.

triggers.text: The gateway disabler activates! The caverns shake as the crystalline network collapses. The connection between this world and the origin nexus weakens. One final push remains.

victory.text: The gateway is disabled! You've severed this world's connection to the hive collective. But the battle for the origin nexus itself awaits. The Architect Prime is still out there, waiting.

scenarios.name: Orbital Platform
scenarios.description: A massive military installation controlling invasion logistics.

background.description: A massive artificial platform orbiting the hive world. Advanced alien technology covers surfaces. Weapon emplacements point outward. Fleet staging area visible. View of the infested planet below. Spacecraft dock stations.

narrative.intro: The orbital platform is the nerve center of the invasion. From here, alien commanders coordinate attacks across dozens of worlds. We must eliminate their leadership and seize control.

triggers.text: The invasion general falls! As their consciousness dissolves, you intercept the final communication: 'The Architect Prime awaits in the origin nexus. Send everyone. The final war begins now.'

victory.text: We've decapitated the invasion command! The alien forces are in disarray. Now is the time to strike at their source. We have one final assault—through the wormhole to the origin nexus.

scenarios.name: The Wormhole Transit
scenarios.description: A journey through dimensional space itself to reach the alien origin.

background.description: Inside a stabilized wormhole. Space twists impossibly with non-Euclidean geometry. Colors that don't exist in normal space surround you. Alien navigation beacons mark the path. A glimpse of impossible world beyond. Reality bends.

objectives.description: Traverse the wormhole to the origin dimension

narrative.intro: You enter the wormhole! Space twists around you in ways your mind cannot process. Colors shift through impossible spectrums. You are traveling between dimensions themselves. On the other side awaits the Architect Prime.

triggers.text: You emerge on the other side! Before you spreads the origin nexus—a fortress-temple of impossible geometry. The hive consciousness is here in physical form. The Architect Prime awaits.

victory.text: You've crossed the dimensional boundary. The origin nexus stands before you. This is where it all began. This is where it ends. Prepare for the final battle.

scenarios.name: The Infected Sector
scenarios.description: A war-torn sector under full invasion and alien civilization.

background.description: A war-torn sector of the alien universe. Entire space stations destroyed. Fleets of biological warships dock at orbital stations. The infrastructure of invasion visible everywhere. Millions of aliens coordinate activity. Vast scale.

narrative.intro: The sector is a graveyard of civilizations. Alien warships stretch to the horizon. Millions upon millions of aliens work in perfect unison. This is the true scale of the hive consciousness. And yet, we are here. We are ready.

triggers.text: The overseer falls! As its consciousness shatters, a single thought breaks through the hive network—the Architect Prime itself turns its attention to you. 'Interesting. Humans who reject assimilation. Perhaps you are worthy.'

victory.text: The infected sector is no longer under hive control. You've proven humanity can stand against the collective consciousness. Now, one final confrontation remains. The Architect Prime waits in the origin nexus itself.

scenarios.name: The Origin Nexus
scenarios.description: The ultimate fortress-temple of the hive consciousness and the Architect Prime itself.

background.description: The highest tier alien fortress-temple. Biological and technological hybrid architecture. Pulsing with dimensional energy. At its center: massive collective consciousness node - the hive mind made physical. Stars visible through transparent walls. Reality warps around the structure.

narrative.intro: You stand before the Architect Prime—the originating consciousness of the entire hive. Its form is incomprehensible: a being of pure thought and dimensional energy. Around you, the very fabric of reality pulses with its power. This is the source of all invasions across all dimensions.

triggers.text: 'Impossible!' the Architect Prime reverberates across dimensions. 'You are fragile, finite, yet you persist. Perhaps assimilation was premature. Perhaps you possess something... valuable.'
The Architect Prime begins to collapse! Its consciousness, spread across infinite dimensions, starts to fragment. The hive network destabilizes. For the first time in eons, the hive experiences fear!

victory.text: The Architect Prime falls! Its consciousness shatters across the dimensional void. The hive network collapses. Across all dimensions, the alien civilization fractures. The invasion is over. Humanity is free. You have saved not just one world, but infinite worlds from the collective consciousness. The void has been sealed. The expansion is ended.
